```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library(broom)
```


```{r}
#read data
data = read_csv("./data/homicide-data.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  mutate(city_state = paste(city, state, sep="_"), 
         not_solved = if_else(
           disposition %in% c("Closed without arrest", "Open/No arrest"), 1, 0))  
         
data |>
  group_by(city_state)
```
